price: Mtupeni katika Jahannamu kila kafiri mwenye inda,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ
footnotes: Malaika wawili wataambiwa: Watieni katika Jahannamu kila aliye pita mipaka kwa ukafiri, na aliye pita mipaka kwa inadi, na akaacha kuifuata Haki,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
